org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE users.type IN ('Group', 'GroupBuiltin', 'GroupAnonymous', 'GroupNonMember') AND (LOWER(users.login) LIKE LOWER('%cli%') OR users.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM email_addresses WHERE LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER('%cli%')) OR LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%cli%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%cli%'))

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE users.type IN ('Group', 'GroupBuiltin', 'GroupAnonymous', 'GroupNonMember') AND (LOWER(users.login) LIKE LOWER('%cli%') OR users.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM email_addresses WHERE LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER('%cli%') LIMIT 1) OR LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%cli%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%cli%'))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE users.type IN ('Group', 'GroupBuiltin', 'GroupAnonymous', 'GroupNonMember') AND (LOWER(users.login) LIKE LOWER('%cli%') OR users.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM email_addresses WHERE LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER('%cli%') LIMIT 1) OR LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%cli%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%cli%')) LIMIT 1
